title: Kan hmachhuan ram mawi chuai ngai lo
lyrics:
Kan hmachhuan ram mawi chuai ngai lo,
Thing rah tin reng an vulna;
Nunna tui thianghin a chim vel,
Ral ram, van mi an lenna.

Thli, lungpui hlau tawh lovin,
Chatuan pialral ramah chuan;
Lawng chawlin puanzar hlipin,
Hmun ralmuang kan thleng ta e.

Chu ram pana hma lam tawnin,
Chhandam chawnban vawr en r'u;
Nun hlun eng, varho zaipawlin,
Van tingtang an rem ngai r'u.

Tuipui luang a chawl cham chungah,
Lawng chawlhtir zai rel ila;
Tui fawn a kiam, mual liam mek a,
Ral ram a lang kim dawn ta.

Thlemnte hnutiang chhawn hunah,
Dam lai thlipui reh hnuah,
Min hruai thlengtu fak hla sain,
Himna lungpui kan awi ang.
